title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When pressing F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy does not appear.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy does not appear when pressing F4 on a binary project selection.
EB: I expect the scoped type hierarchy to be displayed when pressing F4 on a binary project selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project. 
2. Select a file within the project. 
3. Press F4 on the selected file.
